div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
102499006Fit and well
161901003Chronic sick
271795006Malaise and fatigue
248264000No complaints
386705008Lightheadedness
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 365275006 (General well-being finding (finding))

publisher.value: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

description.value: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of General well-being finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT
